1.title: Covering My Self Harm Scars

episode of.title: A Tattoo to Change Your Life (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: Viktoria has had self harm scars since she was eleven years old and, as a medical student, is conscious of people seeing them. She's now getting a tattoo to cover them.

2.title: Covering My Acne Scars

episode of.title: A Tattoo to Change Your Life (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: Ash has had acne scars since since he was sixteen years old and it's affected his self-confidence, so he's getting a tattoo to cover them.

3.title: Covering My Mastectomy Scars

episode of.title: A Tattoo to Change Your Life (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: Following her breast cancer diagnosis and subsequent mastectomy, Maia feels self conscious about her scars and is getting a tattoo to cover them.

4.title: Covering the Scars From the Plane Crash That Killed My Family

episode of.title: A Tattoo to Change Your Life (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: Tulsi was involved in a plane crash 27 years ago in which she lost her mother, father and brother. She gets a tattoo in memory of them.

5.title: Covering My Stretch Marks

episode of.title: A Tattoo to Change Your Life (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: Jen has had stretch marks since she lost ten stone, and they remind her of a past she wants to move forward from. She gets a tattoo to cover one of them up.

6.title: Putting My Far Right Past Behind Me

episode of.title: A Tattoo to Change Your Life (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: Ivan is a former EDL member who wants to get a positive tattoo to mark his transformation, and spread his message of debate not hate.

episode of.title: A Tattoo to Change Your Life (TV Series 2018– )

imdb.title: A Tattoo to Change Your Life
akas: A Tattoo to Change Your Life (United Kingdom)
plot: Bold and stylish BBC Three programme following inspiring and fearless characters as they get life changing and transformative tattoos, in a bid to put their difficult pasts behind them and embark on a new chapter.
